page.title: List of Wako-Pro World Grand Prix events

revisions.rev:
This is a list of events held and scheduled by the [[World Association of Kickboxing Organizations|Wako-Pro]] , an international [[kickboxing]] organization based in [[Monza]], [[Italy]]. The list consists of all the official [[List of Wako-Pro World Grand Prix events|Wako-Pro World Grand Prix]] events. ==List of Wako-Pro World Grand Prix events{{cite web|url=http://www.wakopro.org/en/Article.aspx?Ctn=84252|title=WAKO-PRO WGP: THE START IN BELGRADE MARCH 5TH |accessdate=2011-02-23}}== {| class="toccolours" width=100% style="clear:both; margin:1.5em auto; text-align:center;" |- |
'''2011 events'''
